customer: City of Springfield Department of Innovation and Technology (DoIT)

scope.description: Provide managed IT modernization support for the Springfield Mobility Services program, including analytics, mapping, and citizen engagement.

tasks.title: Discovery & Planning
tasks.description: Gather current-state documentation, confirm requirements, and produce a modernization roadmap.

tasks.title: Platform Enhancement
tasks.description: Implement cloud infrastructure updates, integrations, and automated monitoring.

tasks.title: Data & Analytics
tasks.description: Build data pipelines, geospatial layers, and executive dashboards.

tasks.title: Training & Transition
tasks.description: Deliver knowledge transfer workshops and user guides for city staff.

requirements.description: Follow municipal procurement rules and FAR Part 12 for commercial services.
Ensure all deliverables meet ADA Section 508 accessibility guidance.
Enforce privacy protections in line with the Privacy Act and city data-handling ordinances.
Key staff: Program Manager, Cloud Engineer, Data Analyst, UX Writer.
Provide signed availability letters for all proposed key personnel.
All staff must complete annual privacy and security training.
Adhere to NIST SP 800-53 Moderate controls for hosted systems.
Use MFA for all administrative access to city systems.
Report any suspected data incident within 2 hours to the City CISO.
Prefer Azure Government services and FedRAMP Moderate SaaS platforms.
Deliver dashboards compatible with Microsoft 365 and Power BI.
Provide APIs that conform to REST/JSON conventions with OpenAPI documentation.
